mailSubject: Update on Missing Data Notification for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Client,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am writing to provide you with an update regarding the missing and pending information for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32). The checklist has been successfully updated with the latest information, and I would like to summarize the current status as follows:

### Updated Checklist Summary:
- **Company Directorship**: Pending - Verification for directors is still ongoing as per the attached data.
- **Company Tax Documentation**: Pending - Some documents are verified; others are still pending or require renewal.
- **Company Regulatory Compliance**: Pending - Industry License and Environmental Compliance are currently under review.
- **Company PEP Screening**: Validated - PEP screening data has been verified, and risks have been mitigated in accordance with AML regulations.

### Checklist Overview:
| **Checklist Item**                | **Status**  | **Comment**                                                                                   |
|-----------------------------------|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof             | Validated   | Utility Bill issued by London City Utilities is valid until 2023-12-31.                       |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated   | Data for the years 2020, 2021, and 2022 is available; Ellipro scores are provided.            |
| Company Bank and Postal Details   | Validated   | Bank account and postal details are available, including SWIFT code and postal code.          |
| Company Directorship              | Pending     | Verification for directors is still pending or under review as per provided attachment.       |
| Company Tax Documentation         | Pending     | Some documents are verified; others are pending or require renewal.                          |
| Company Regulatory Compliance     | Pending     | Industry License and Environmental Compliance are under review.                              |
| Company Business Scope            | Validated   | Detailed information about business activities, global operations, and community role.       |
| Company PEP Screening             | Validated   | PEP screening data verified from attachment; risks mitigated per AML regulations.            |
| Company Revenue Details           | Validated   | Revenue details were disclosed: Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars (2023).            |
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated   | Market capitalization disclosed: 489,320 million dollars as of December 31, 2023.            |

Please let me know if you need any further assistance or additional information regarding this matter.

Thank you for your attention.

Best regards,  
Surbhi Nagori  
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com
